main event: The observer sighted a green light coming down at a very great slant for 2 seconds in Lynbrook, New York.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 2 seconds.
The object was described as a green light.
The object was moving at a very great slant downward.
The report concludes the object was a 'probable astro (green meteor)'.
The observer completed a detailed sighting report questionnaire.
photographs: yes, the report indicates photos were taken
